Title: Den russiske sangerinde
Writer: William Aldridge, Morten Arnfred, Leif Davidsen (novel), Leif Davidsen (screenplay)
Actors: Ole Lemmeke, Elena Butenko, Vsevolod Larionov, Igor Volkov
Plot: Two women are found dead in one Moscow apartment. Since one of them was a secretary in the Danish embassy, diplomat Jack Anderson is assigned to observe the investigation. While the Russian authorities want to portray the tragedy as an accident and quickly shut the case, Anderson is becoming convinced that the women were murdered and that a powerful general was responsible.
